asset_incentive.description: Existing asset incentive for a given address. Will return None if it doesn't exist

AssetIncentive.description: Incentive Metadata for a given incentive

emission_per_second.description: How much MARS per second is emitted to be then distributed to all maToken holders

index.description: Total MARS assigned for distribution since the start of the incentive

last_updated.description: Last time (in seconds) index was updated

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
